description: The Catena Institute of Wine, an arm of the renowned Argentine winemaking company Catena Zapata, focuses on enhancing wine quality through scientific research and innovation. Established by the Catena family, it aims to position Argentine wines globally while addressing sustainability and climate change challenges. The institute collaborates with various academic and research institutions to develop new techniques in viticulture, ensuring the future of winemaking in Argentina and promoting the Malbec variety's legacy.
name: Catena Institute of Wine
